title: Bergeson-Peace Infrastructure and Economic Development Bank Act.
subject: Bergeson-PeaceInfrastructureandEconomicDevelopmentBankAct

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law finds and declares that it is the intent of the Legislature, in enacting the Bergeson-Peace Infrastructure and Economic Development Bank Act, to create a mechanism to finance projects needed to implement economic development and job creation and growth management strategies, and to provide a secure and stable funding source for implementation of the act in order to meet critical economic, social, and environmental concerns.

This bill would make a nonsubstantive change to the provisions described above that make findings and declarations relating to the Bergeson-Peace Infrastructure and Economic Development Bank Act.

actions.description: From printer. May be heard in committee March 20.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 63000 of the Government Code, relating to economic development.
